sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.specid, a.mtitemid, name, unitid, displaytype, methodname, specnm, spec, itemid, itemPID
FROM ( SELECT b.specid, a.mtitemid, c.name, d.unitid, d.displaytype, e.name methodname, b.specnm, c.itemID, c.itemPID FROM tce_master_item a , tne_spec b , tce_item c , tne_item_detail d , tce_method e WHERE a.masterid = b.masterid (+) AND a.itemid = c.itemid AND a.itemid = d.itemid (+) AND a.methodid = d.methodid (+) AND a.methodid = e.methodid (+) AND a.masterid = #masterID# ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT specid, mtitemid, spec FROM tne_spec_detail ) b ON a.specid = b.specid AND a.mtitemid = b.mtitemid START WITH (ITEMPID = 0) CONNECT BY PRIOR ITEMID = A.ITEMPID
sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO tne_spec_detail A USING ( SELECT b.specid, a.mtitemid FROM tce_master_item a, tne_spec b WHERE a.masterid = b.masterid AND a.mtitemid = #mtitemid# AND b.specid = #specid# ) tmp ON ( A.specid = tmp.specid AND A.mtitemid = tmp.mtitemid ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.spec = #spec# , A.MODIFYID = #modifyid# , A.MODIFYDATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (A.SPECID, A.MTITEMID, A.SPEC, A.REGID, A.REGDATE) VALUES (tmp.specid, tmp.mtitemid, #spec#, #modifyid#, sysdate)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TNE_SPEC (SPECID, MASTERID, SPECNM, REGID, REGDATE) VALUES (seq_tne_spec.nextval, #masterID#, #specNM#, #regID#, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TNE_SPEC SET SPECNM = #specNM#, MODIFYID = #modifyID#, MODIFYDATE = SYSDATE WHERE SPECID = #specID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT SPECID, MASTERID, SPECNM, REGID FROM TNE_SPEC WHERE MASTERID = #str#
SELECT A.CLASSID, A.NAME, A.ENAME, A.ORDERBY, A.USEFLAG, A.REGID, A.MODIFYID FROM TEMS.TCE_CLASS A
SELECT GROUPID, CLASSID, NAME, ENAME, OFFICEID, ADMINID, REMARK, USEFLAG, ORDERBY, REGID, REGDATE, MODIFYID, MODIFYDATE FROM TCE_GROUP A ORDER BY CLASSID

SELECT MASTERID, GROUPID, NAME, ENAME, REMARK, USEFLAG, ORDERBY, SMPUNIT, REGID, REGDATE, MODIFYID, MODIFYDATE, (SELECT count(ITEMID) from TCE_MASTER_ITEM WHERE MASTERID = A.MASTERID) CNT FROM TCE_MASTER A
